        <!-- Start_Module_1930 --><div id="dnn_ctr1930_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	
<div id="dnn_ctr1930_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
	<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 11px; color: #ff0000;"><strong> Needles and Big Bear Courthouses to offer Remote Video Proceedings. Click here for more <a onclick="return false;" href="/Divisions/Traffic/RemoteVideoProceedings.aspx" target="blank">Information</a>. <br />
Find Resources and Information on Immigration Issues <a onclick="return false;" href="http://www.courts.ca.gov/immigration.htm" target="_blank" re_target="_blank">Here</a>.<br />
We hope you can join us for the "Wednesdays on the Plaza" concert events. Click here for <a onclick="return false;" href="/Portals/0/Documents/PDF/NewsandNotices/WednesdaysOnThePlazaFlyer.pdf" target="_blank" re_target="_blank">Schedule</a>. </strong></span></p>

                        <h2>News &amp; Notices</h2>
                        <div id="dnn_NewsAndNotices" class="ContentPane"><div class="DnnModule DnnModule-DNN_Announcements DnnModule-395"><a name="395"></a><div id="dnn_ctr395_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_395 --><div id="dnn_ctr395_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNAnnouncementsC">

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function($) {
        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('#imageGallery').gallery({
                interval: 9000,
                ratio: 0.16,
                height: '225px',
                width: '400px',
                onClick: function(event, element) {
                    var getLink = $(element).attr("data-link");
                    if (getLink.length > 0) {
                        document.location.href = getLink;
                    }
                }
            });

            $("div.howDoI h4").hoverIntent({
                sensitivity: 3,
                interval: 100,
                over: overStateDropDownHowDoI
            }).click(clickDropDownHowDoI);

            $("div.howDoI div.ContentPane").hide();
            $("div.howDoI").mouseleave(function() {
                if ($(this).children("h4").hasClass("over")) {
                    $(this).children("div.ContentPane").slideUp("fast",
                        function() {
                            $(this).parent().children("h4").removeClass("over");
                            'Cufon.replace(this)("h4");'
                        });
                }
            });

            $("input.translate").hoverIntent({
                sensitivity: 7,
                interval: 100,
                over: overStateDropDownTranslate
            });

            $("div.translateWrapper").mouseleave(function() {
                if ($(this).children("input").hasClass("over")) {
                    $(this).children("ul").slideUp("fast",
                        function() {
                            $(this).parent().children("input").removeClass("over");
                        });
                }
            });


            $('#searchGo').click(function() {
                var text = $('#searchBox').val();
                document.location = '/SearchResults.aspx?search=' + text;
            });

            $("body").link_external_icon({
                icon_path: '/images/link_external.png'
            });

        });

        function overStateDropDownHowDoI() {
            if (!$(this).hasClass("over")) {
                $(this).parent().children("div.ContentPane").slideDown("fast");
                $(this).addClass("over");
                'Cufon.replace(this)("h4");'
            }
        }

        function clickDropDownHowDoI() {
            if (!$(this).hasClass("over")) {
                $(this).parent().children("div.ContentPane").slideDown("fast");
                $(this).addClass("over");
                'Cufon.replace(this)("h4");'
            }
            else {
                $(this).parent().children("div.ContentPane").slideUp("fast");
                $(this).removeClass("over");
                'Cufon.replace(this)("h4");'
            }
        }

        function overStateDropDownTranslate() {
            if (!$(this).hasClass("over")) {
                $(this).parent().children("ul").slideDown("fast");
                $(this).addClass("over");
                ' Cufon.replace(this);'
            }
        }
    })($telerik.$);

    function doClick(e, buttonid) {
        var evt = e ? e : window.event;
        var bt = document.getElementById(buttonid);
        if (bt) {
            if (evt.keyCode == 13) {
                bt.click();
                return false;
            }
        }
    }
</script>
